attributes.action: Move the UK Parliament out of an expensive & over-important London
attributes.additional_details: The time is right to renew our democracy - and renewing our Parliament should form a central part of that.
attributes.background: trust in democracy is at historically low levels and a clean break from a past mired in scandals would help to restore that trust. Moving MPs into the heart of the UK and into new parliament buildings which places openness, transparency and public access at its centre will help to restore that trust
